programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Auf der Suche nach einer künstlichen Form von Chinin entsteht zufällig der erste künstliche Farbstoff, Mauvein. Ein gescheitertes Reinigungsmittel führt zur Erfindung von Frischhaltefolie. Bei einem Versuch, Bakterien im Labor zu züchten, wird ein Krebsmedikament entdeckt. Und Krankenschwestern an der Westfront erfinden die Damenbinde.

programme.title: Phänomen Sonnenfinsternis
programme.desc: Im Jahr 2017 fanden zwei Sonnenfinsternisse statt. Millionen von Menschen beobachteten gebannt, wie der Mond die Sonne bedeckte und seinen Schatten auf die Erde warf. Am 26. Februar bedeckte der Mond die Sonne zu mehr als 99 Prozent. In Nordamerika dauerte die totale Sonnenfinsternis vom 21. August 90 Minuten, und der Kernschatten überstrich insgesamt 14 Bundesstaaten.

programme.title: Die Jagd nach der dunklen Materie
programme.desc: Das CERN und die University of California, Santa Barbara sind zusammen auf der Suche nach einer flüchtigen Substanz, die das Universum zusammenhält, wie Physiker und Astronomen glauben: Dunkle Materie. Wie weit ist die Forschung im Bereich der Teilchenphysik vorangeschritten und was kommt als nächstes?

programme.title: Mysteriöses Signal aus dem All
programme.desc: Im Green-Bank-Observatorium tief in den Bergen des US-Bundesstaates West Virginia werden rätselhafte Signale empfangen. Könnte dies ein Hinweis auf die Existenz von Leben und sogar anderen Zivilisationen im All sein? Das größte voll bewegliche Radioteleskop der Welt, mit dem Pulsare, Schwarze Löcher und andere interstellare Phänomene beobachtet werden, soll eine Antwort auf diese Frage geben.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die erfolglose Suche nach einem sichereren Kühlmittel führt zur Erfindung von Teflon, eine beschädigte Lieferkiste zur Erfindung von Dynamit. Eine zufällige Begegnung zwischen dem Hollywoodstar Hedy Lamarr und einem Komponisten ebnet den Weg für WLAN - und Pawlows Hundeexperiment für unsere Handysucht.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die Dämpfe eines zerbrochenen Thermometers führen zur Erfindung der Fotografie. Radarteile und ein schmelzender Schokoriegel besiegeln den Siegeszug der Mikrowelle. Und als ein potenzielles Herzmedikament in Studien getestet wird, stellt man fest, dass es auf ein anderes Organ viel stärker wirkt. Später wird es unter dem Namen Viagra bekannt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein dreckiges Labor und ein Urlaub führen zur Entdeckung unserer ersten wirksamen Waffe gegen Bakterien: Penicillin. Die Entschlossenheit eines Wissenschaftlers, die "falsche" Lösung zu testen, beschert uns einen besonders starken Kunststoff. Und aus einem nicht funktionierenden Laser wird die LED-Leuchte.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Als der Schweizer Chemiker Albert Hofmann an einem Kreislaufmedikament forscht, entdeckt er zufällig LSD. Ein deutscher Chemiker hingegen will eigentlich einen Farbstoff herstellen, doch es entsteht hochexplosives TNT. Außerdem spielt ein mit Urin gefüllter Kühlschrank eine Rolle bei der Verbesserung der psychiatrischen Versorgung.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein gescheitertes Blutdruckmedikament und unerwartet starker Haarwuchs bei einer Frau führen zu einem Mittel gegen Glatzen. Ein Versuch, das Kräuseln des Papiers in einem Zeitungsdrucker zu verhindern, beschert uns die Klimaanlage. Und auch Wilhelm Röntgen wurde bei seiner größten Erfindung vom Zufall unterstützt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein junger Medizinstudent glaubt, dass es einen Zusammenhang zwischen der Kopfform und der Intelligenz seiner Kommilitonen gibt und prägt damit die Neurowissenschaft. Als ein Chemiker im Zweiten Weltkrieg nach transparentem Kunststoff für Zielfernrohre forscht, entdeckt er nebenbei den Sekundenkleber. Und auch das Bier verdanken wir einer Reihe von Zufällen.

programme.title: Endstation Davidwache
programme.desc: "Mir wurde mein Iphone gestohlen", diesen Satz hören die Polizisten auf Deutschland berühmtester Wache Samstagnacht dutzendfach. Auch die Schilderungen vom Betrug im Bordell: Herren schildern, wie sie von den Damen des Gewerbes "über den Tisch gezogen" wurden. Ebenso Berichte von Touristen, sie hätten horrende Getränkerechnungen in einem Strip-Lokal berappen müssen.

programme.title: Mensch, St. Pauli! Teil 1
programme.desc: Auf 930 Metern Länge tummeln sich Travestiekünstler, Notärzte im Einsatz, Stripper und jede Menge Krawallmacher, die nicht selten ihren Weg in die berühmt berüchtigte Davidwache finden. Denn die Gewalt nimmt zu auf der „Geilen Meile“, wenn der Alkoholpegel steigt und die Party beginnt. Doch Drag Queen Olivia Jones führt ihre Besucher beherzt und sicher durch den quirligen Kiezdschungel. (S1 E01)

programme.title: Mensch, St. Pauli! Teil 2
programme.desc: Das Hotel East mitten in St. Pauli öffnet seinen Nachtclub nur für ausgewählte Gäste. An der traditionellen Bratwurstbude auf der Reeperbahn wird schon seit Jahrzehnten jeder hungrige Gast bedient. Das weiß der Chefredakteur der St-Pauli Nachrichten zu berichten, der um das Überleben seiner Sexpostille kämpft. Licht- und Schattenseiten liegen dicht beieinander auf Hamburgs sündiger Meile. (S1 E02)

programme.title: Mensch, St. Pauli! Teil 3
programme.desc: Hamburgs schrillster Stadtteil vereint die unterschiedlichsten Schicksale: Carmen, 23 Jahre, alleinerziehende Mutter, träumt von einer Karriere als Stripperin. Stefan, gelernter Bademeister aus Duisburg, baut sich hier gerade eine Zweitkarriere als reisender Dessousverkäufer für die Mädchen in der Herbertstrasse auf. Und am Millerntor soll eine Kochschule entstehen. (S1 E03)

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Felix und Max sind leidenschaftliche Motorradfahrer und lieben die Geschwindigkeit. Heute wollen sie sich diesen Kick auf Borkum ganz ohne Motor geben. Mit der unberechenbaren Kraft des Windes geht es mit einem Kitebuggy über den kilometerlagen Strand. Diese Gefährte erreichen dabei bis zu 100 Kilometer die Stunde. Die beiden haben es sich allerdings leichter vorgestellt, als es tatsächlich ist.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Skiken ist eine nordische Sportart bei der man auf Skiern mit Rollen auch im Sommer die Pisten unsicher machen kann. Allerdings stand John noch nie in seinem Leben auf Skiern, geschweige denn Skikes. Kann Skike-Trainer Erik Kreutzner ihn heute wirklich von seinem Lieblingssport begeistern oder vergeht John so die komplette Lust aufs Skifahren?

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Felix und Max begeben sich auf moderne Schatzsuche. Mit Hilfe von GPS-Koordinaten gilt es "Caches" zu finden, die andere Abenteurer versteckt haben. Im Wald wollen sie einen Multicache finden. Dabei geht es darum, mehrere Verstecke aufzuspüren, um am Ende einen Bonuscache zu entdecken. Um die Aufgabe meistern zu können, beginnt die Schnitzeljagd der Schulfreunde in aller Frühe.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Felix und Max wollen dieses Mal auf das Dach Deutschlands. Ohne Vorbereitung wollen Sie den Gipfel der Zugspitze in fast 3.000 Metern Höhe erklimmen. Den Aufstieg wollen die Abenteurer in zwei Tagen schaffen, doch im hochalpinen Gelände geht ihnen langsam die Puste aus. Zudem macht Max seine Höhenangst mit jedem Meter mehr zu schaffen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Wing Foil Surfen ist der neue Hype im Wassersport. Auf Norderney wollen Felix und Max diesen Trend im Selbstversuch ausprobieren. Die Österreicherin Evi und der Schotte John wollen heute eine Nacht in luftiger Höhe verbringen. Christian und seine Freundin Jana wollen heute mit Hilfe des Mikroabenteuer-Experten Christo Foerster von der Nordsee bis zur Ostsee laufen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: In "Bayrisch Kanada" wollen die Naturjunkies John und Evi heute mit einem Stand Up Paddle aufs Wildwasser. Die Berliner Köche Christian und Felix machen eine Fahrradtour auf dem Wasser. Und eine idyllische Ballonfahrt endet heute für Felix und Max im freien Fall. GoKart-Fahren kann jeder - Felix und Max wollen heute eine fahrende Bierkiste bauen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Die Stuttgarter Felix und Max starten ihr Mikroabenteuer diesmal direkt vor der Haustür. Mit einem Longboard wollen sie mitten auf der Schwäbischen Alb 35 Kilometer zurücklegen. Der Berliner Christian will heute mit seinem Sohn und Freundin Jana ein Floss bauen und das soll die drei am Ende auch noch trocken übers Wasser bringen. Eine idyllische Ballonfahrt endet heute für John im freien Fall.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Im Erzgebirge haben sich der Mountainbiker Christian und sein bester Freund Til vorgenommen, an zwei Tagen den Bikeman Trail zu bezwingen. Im Allgäu steht John am Abgrund - er testet beim Klippenspringen seinen Mut. Und beim Apnoetauchen im Blindsee erleben Felix und Max einen Tiefenrausch. 15 Meter wollen sie mit nur einem Atemzug bezwingen.

programme.title: Der Extrembergsteiger
programme.desc: Jost Kobusch hat sich zum Ziel gesetzt, den jeweils höchsten Berg auf den sieben Kontinenten zu besteigen. Den 26-jährigen zieht es dorthin, wo noch niemand vor ihm war und wenn doch, dann wählt er andere Routen, um zum Gipfel zu gelangen. Immer ist er allein unterwegs, ohne Hilfsmittel oder Sherpas und vorzugsweise im Winter, wenn niemand außer ihm den Trip wagt

programme.title: Anleitung zum Verlieben
programme.desc: Die erfolgreiche Unternehmerin Cassandra 'Cass' Barber (Meghan Markle) verliebt sich immer in die falschen Männer - und wagt deshalb ein Experiment mit dem Selbsthilfebuch "The Dater's Handbook" von Beziehungsexpertin Dr. Susie (Teryl Rothery). Sie befolgt jeden Ratschlag und hat schließlich die Wahl zwischen dem verlässlichen George (Jonathan Scarfe) und dem lebensfrohen Robert (Kristoffer Polaha). Aber was tun, wenn die Fachliteratur das eine, und das Herz was ganz anderes sagt? Für wen wird sich Cass entscheiden?

programme.title: Mit Liebe für Sie gemacht
programme.desc: Second-Hand-Brautkleidbesitzerin gibt gebrauchten Kleidern neues Leben. Fürchtet sich vor zweiter Liebeschance.

programme.title: Liebe in der Übersetzung
programme.desc: Linguistik-Ph.D. Julie lehrt Französisch auf unterhaltsame Weise. Funken fliegen, wenn sie mit dem gutaussehenden Museums-Kurator Dan zusammenarbeitet.

programme.title: A Crooked Somebody
programme.desc: Im Leben von Michael Vaughn (Rich Sommer) läuft es momentan äußerst schlecht. Als angebliches 'Medium' bewirbt er sein erfolgloses Buch bei Lesungen in heruntergekommenen Motels. Trotzdem schafft er es immer wieder, den Leuten vorzugaukeln, er könne mit den Toten kommunizieren. Vor allem der psychotische Nathan (Clifton Collins jr.) glaubt an Michaels Fähigkeiten und befürchtet, dieser könnte in Kontakt mit einer von ihm getöteten Person treten. Kurzerhand entführt er Michael um zu verhindern, dass seine Tat jemals ans Licht kommt…

programme.title: Angelica
programme.desc: London im Jahre 1880: Als die junge Verkäuferin Constance (Jena Malone) den attraktiven Wissenschaftler Joseph Barton trifft, verlieben sich die beiden umgehend ineinander. Auf eine schnelle Hochzeit folgt ein leidenschaftliches Liebesleben, welches jedoch durch die Geburt ihrer Tochter Angelica getrübt wird. Constances Körper ist nämlich nicht zum Gebären geeignet und sie überlebt die Entbindung nur denkbar knapp. Constanze muss sich ihrem eigenen Mann entziehen, was nicht nur zu tiefen Gräben in ihrer Beziehung führt – der Druck und die anhaltende Angst treiben Constance langsam aber sicher in den Wahnsinn.

programme.title: Tödlicher Austausch
programme.desc: Nach dem Tod eines Mannes et Blakes Verdacht beginnt ihre Mutter, dem Austauschstudenten zu misstrauen.

programme.title: Mit Liebe für Sie gemacht
programme.desc: Second-Hand-Brautkleidbesitzerin gibt gebrauchten Kleidern neues Leben. Fürchtet sich vor zweiter Liebeschance.

programme.title: Liebe, Blasen und Kristallbucht
programme.desc: Skye führt "Lather and Luxury". Jugendliebe Gavin bringt Verbesserungen. Funken fliegen, Liebe entdeckt.

programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla that's been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator races to save the woman he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after it's revealed he's a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hit man must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. However, when they learn they are being betrayed, the unlikely pair turns into a lethal team, with their double-crossing bosses in their sights.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demon's bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lord's son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Muppets From Space
programme.desc: Gonzo is convinced that he is of alien origin and struggles to communicate with his family in outer space. However, a government agent, determined to prove the existence of extraterrestrial life, captures Gonzo and it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue him and reunite him with his long-lost family.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A boy discovers he is `The Seeker', the last in a line of time-travelling peacekeepers who must fight against the evil Dark.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Bitten by a radioactive spider, teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into Spider-Man. He must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: Nicknamed the `Tooth Fairy' due to his penchant for knocking out other players' teeth, an arrogant hockey player's moniker becomes very apt when he steals a dollar that his girlfriend Carly's daughter has left for the real Tooth Fairy. Sprouting wings, Derek is summoned to meet the leader of the fairies, Lily, who labels him a `dream crusher' and orders him to serve as a tooth fairy to make up for his transgressions.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The ex-leader of an elite military task force is pressed back into service when his daughter is kidnapped.

programme.title: American Woman
programme.desc: In a small blue-collar town in Pennsylvania, a 32-year-old woman's teenage daughter goes missing. Left to raise her infant grandson alone, she desperately seeks the answers behind her daughter's disappearance.

programme.title: You Are Not My Mother
programme.desc: In a North Dublin housing estate, Char's mother goes missing. When she returns, Char is determined to uncover the truth of her disappearance and unearth the dark secrets of her family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: BSL Zone [NEW]
programme.desc: Teams consisting of a child and an adult compete for £1,000. Will we see a family feud as these teams face five challenging games? [SL].

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: A portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, beginning with his initially successful exploits in the North African desert until his defeat by Montgomery. Returning to Berlin, he becomes involved with Colonel Von Stauffenberg's plot to assassinate Hitler, but when the dictator escapes the bomb and the conspirators are rounded up, Rommel, because of his high standing with the German public, is offered the choice of suicide.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: Oscar-winning movie set in 1920s Paris, in which an exiled group of White Russians claim to have discovered the daughter of the Tsar, presumed dead for ten years. In truth, she is an amnesiac refugee who has been selected to impersonate the heiress, but she must pass a severe test under the scrutiny of the Dowager Empress.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: When their ship docks, the crew disembark as usual to pick up their lives in postwar London. For one of them his petty smuggling turns more serious when he finds himself caught up with a robbery.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lieutenant Colonel Kirby Yorke heads a cavalry post on the Texas side of the Rio Grande, defending settlers against Apaches launching raids from the Mexican side of the river. When Yorke's 16-year-old son, Jeff --- who he has not seen since he was a baby -- shows up at the post as one of the new recruits, he treats him more harshly than the others. Things are further complicated when Yorke's estranged wife, Kathleen, returns to take her son home.

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane carrying a team of oil workers crash lands in the Gobi Desert. With supplies running low and bandits closing in, the survivors have little choice but to rebuild the wreck.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Io capitano [NEW]
programme.desc: Seydou and Moussa, two 16-year-old Senegalese boys, decide to leave their homeland for Europe. Along the way, however, their dreams and hopes of a better life are quickly dashed by the dangers of the journey.

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: A vulgar Irish cop and a straight-laced American FBI agent uncover police corruption amongst the former's superiors while probing a drug-trafficking ring.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A law enforcement cowboy, about to retire, aims to go out in a blaze by going on a crusade against local villains. However, his resolve weakens when an attractive musical star arrives in town.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Powerful and engrossing World War II tale centred on the exploits of frogmen in an underwater demolition team, headed by Lieutenant Commander John Lawrence, as they fight the Japanese.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: On his deathbed, King Henry VIII recalls how he wooed and wed his six wives - and disposed of five of them - in a bid to secure the succession to the throne with a male heir. Despite his many marriages and the crowded Court, Henry remains essentially lonely.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A soldier turned pacifist, recently returned from a bloody war, is forced into a confrontation with a bullying cattle baron. The disabled cattleman uses violence and scare tactics to push out smaller ranchers and farmers.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughter's birth.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover they're actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a regiment of black soldiers in the American Civil War who are led by an inexperienced white officer in the fight against the Confederacy. The soldiers and their commander must overcome the racism of fellow Union officers and prove their valour on the battlefield.

programme.title: And Then We Danced
programme.desc: Merab has been training from a young age at the National Georgian Ensemble with his dance partner Mary. His world turns upside down when the carefree Irakli arrives and becomes both his strongest rival and desire.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: Two elderly brothers attempt to do away with each other in order to be the recipient of a massive family inheritance. Comic chaos and all kinds of shenanigans ensue as the two try anything, legal and otherwise, to guarantee becoming the sole surviving beneficiary.

programme.title: 13 rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies: Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The comic tale of a failed sailor who sparks jealousies in a seaside community when he strikes it big in the end-of-the-pier entertainment trade. Captain Ambrose comes from a long line of seafarers, but can't be a sailor due to his seasickness, so he sets up store in a small British town, Sandcastle-on-Sea.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical epic spectacularly reenacting the heroic efforts of a handful of Spartan soldiers against the full might of the Persian army at Thermopylae in 480 BC.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: An insecure man competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father breezes back into town.

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: An American oil-rig roughneck travels to Marseille, France, to visit his estranged daughter, in prison for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with language barriers, cultural differences and a complicated legal system, he soon builds a new life for himself as he makes it his personal mission to exonerate her.

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: A misguided young woman who is desperate for friends and fame fakes a trip to Paris to update her social media presence. A terrifying incident takes place in the real world, which becomes a part of the imaginary trip and offers all she wants.

programme.title: Second Coming
programme.desc: A tight family unit navigating their way through family life as it breaks down in the aftermath of an unexplained pregnancy.

programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Young Winston
programme.desc: Lavish rendering of Winston Churchill's early life, from his school days, through his adventures in Africa, to his first days in Parliament. It begins with Churchill as a junior officer in India out to make a name for himself. It is suggested that becoming a war correspondent would be a good career move. His colourful, often controversial, reports make him a household name, aiding his passage into politics.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A lovable Catholic priest sets out to retrieve the priceless cross stolen by a thief named Flambeau during a trip to Rome. However, Father Brown is not an ordinary churchman, and the thief meets his match.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: Modest in scale only, this gripping rescue drama reeks of sweat-soaked claustrophobia and suspense. Peter Dawson heads a team of experts, doctors and welders racing against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: The Black Arrow
programme.desc: Richard Shelton returns victorious from the War of the Roses only to discover that his father has been murdered.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: American submarine Captain Joe Glass is on the hunt for a U.S. sub in distress in the Arctic Ocean. He soon learns that a secret Russian coup is in the offing, a conspiracy that threatens to dismantle the world order. With crew and country on the line, Glass must assemble an elite group of Navy SEALs to sneak through enemy waters, rescue the kidnapped Russian president and prevent World War III.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A young and impetuous naval lieutenant and a more experienced officer are given the job of defending two marines accused of murder. As the two officers come to terms with one another, their investigation uncovers some sinister secrets and collusion at the highest level. The marines' commanding officer certainly has no intention of making the truth public.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: I Am Not a Witch
programme.desc: The first child is taken to a travelling witch camp, where she is told that she should cut the ribbon and attempt to escape. Crossing the witches is a bad idea and she risks being cursed and transformed into a goat.

programme.title: William Morris All Time Favourite Quilt Kit
programme.desc: Katharine Wright demonstrates the stunning William Morris All Time Favourite Quilt Kit.

programme.title: Hobby Maker
programme.desc: Bringing the best in entertainment.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and three friends drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing, nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang have narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now the gang have happy lives at home, but Alan doesn't. Still lacking a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and three friends drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing, nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang have narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now the gang have happy lives at home, but Alan doesn't. Still lacking a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friend's girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: World Cup Netball: Semi-Final: England v New Zealand
programme.desc: Hosts England bid to make the Netball World Cup final as they meet New Zealand in the second semi-final at the M&S Bank Arena in Liverpool.

programme.title: World Cup Rugby Union
programme.desc: Jill Douglas presents highlights of the Rugby World Cup 3rd-4th place play-off from Tokyo.

programme.title: World Cup Rugby Union
programme.desc: Clare MacNamara is joined by Bernard Jackman, Brent Pope and Eddie OSullivan for highlights and analysis of the Rugby World Cup 2019 Final.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Union
programme.desc: From Stade Jean-Dauger in Bayonne, Aquitaine, France.

programme.title: All Blacks Podcast
programme.desc: Richie McCaw Double Rugby World Cup winner and World Rugby Hall of Fame member Richie McCaw joins the podcast to reflect on his debut against Ireland and share memories from his storied career in the black jersey, hosted by Rob Dunne.

programme.title: All Blacks Podcast
programme.desc: Campbell Johnstone The official podcast from New Zealand rugby - featuring interviews with some of the biggest and most influential names in New Zealand and global rugby.

programme.title: All Blacks: In Their Own Words
programme.desc: Brotherhood The All Blacks conclude the season with four tests in as many weeks in Japan and the UK. Live alongside the team as they explore the power of the haka as a binding force, and share in the intimate moments of life on the road with a team seeking the perfect finish to a tumultuous year.

programme.title: All Blacks: In Their Own Words
programme.desc: Evolution The All Blacks confront their challenges, as individuals and a team, and begin to find the form and freedom they have been seeking. The wins begin to stack up, along with the trophies.

programme.title: All Blacks: In Their Own Words
programme.desc: Honesty With scrutiny mounting around the team following the Irish series, Head Coach Ian Foster made radical changes to his coaching team, bringing in forwards coach Jason Ryan from the Crusaders. Ryan's no-nonsense approach helped change All Black fortunes in Africa, but the honeymoon period was short-lived.

programme.title: All Blacks: In Their Own Words
programme.desc: Loyalty Following a disappointing end to 2021, the All Blacks welcomed the number one ranked side in the world, Ireland, for a three-Test series in July. The team were challenged on and off the field, bringing about unprecedented change in camp, and the team travelled to South Africa fighting for pride - and each other.

programme.title: Rugby World Cup 2023: Pool A
programme.desc: Coverage of the tenth edition of the men's Rugby World Cup.

programme.title: Rugby World Cup 2023: Pool A: New Zealand v Uruguay
programme.desc: Coverage of the tenth edition of the men's Rugby World Cup.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a special edition as `Strictly Come Dancing's' Motsi Mabuse is joined by her sister and fellow TV judge, `Dancing on Ice's' Oti Mabuse, and they take on the infamous Banker together.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Solicitor Sapna, work planner Ben, and custody officer Deborah take on the Wheel and some head-scratching puzzles to win a possible 50,000 pounds.

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Nikki Fox, Robert Rinder and Georgia Taylor all try to "say what they see", as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to win a 50,000 pound jackpot for their chosen charity.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: News from the world of entertainment.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: News from the world of entertainment.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaad's bride-to-be from a dangerous castle. A Dreamworks animation.

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: News from the world of entertainment.

programme.title: Big Brother [NEW]
programme.desc: A new cast of carefully selected housemates from all walks of life will take up residence in the world's most famous reality TV home for up to six weeks, with cameras capturing their every move and the nation following every twist and turn.

programme.title: Big Brother: Late and Live [NEW]
programme.desc: Filmed at the Big Brother house in front of a live studio audience, the go-to destination for the first live interviews with evictees, exclusive camera run access, celebrity guest commentary, debates, and weekly nomination results.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois takes Peter to open a checking account, and they discover that his first name is actually Justin, which Peter adopts as the name of his younger bro-style alter-ego. Then, Peter/Justin throws a party, during which Quagmire unknowingly gets into some trouble with his mother.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Quagmire, Joe and Cleveland discover that Chris is a thief when they form a neighbourhood detective agency, and Lois worries about Chris' relationship with his girlfriend.

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: After Stan is injured, Francine nurses him back to health and he becomes dependent to her. The family discovers Tuttle is a Korean reality show star.

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve discovers his mum has never stopped giving him her breast milk.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Donna is given her opportunity to open the iconic red boxes - if she avoids the temptation to accept an offer from the Banker in exchange for what might be inside her chosen box, she could hold out until the end and be rewarded with the 100,000-pound jackpot.

programme.title: Transaction
programme.desc: Liv is suspicious of Tom and co-worker Millie's blossoming friendship and spirals into madness trying to learn Millie's secrets, Simon tries to instil a sense of safety in his staff - but causes chaos in the process and sets off a race against time to sell off all his meat by midnight - and it is also Tom's birthday but no-one seems to care.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: The Spectral Lands
programme.desc: Arin ventures into a dangerous new land to heal Ras while Nya and Kai come up with a plan to make Jay come to them.

programme.title: The Great Zane Robbery
programme.desc: Zane's search for Arin leads to an old friend but lands him in the middle of the Forbidden Five's hunt for the Prismatic Blades.

programme.title: Legendary Places, Ninjago's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Cole joins Jay and Zane inside the Nindroid to solve a mysterious puzzle and also Kai enters Zane's mind and suggests the Ninja take a break from puzzle-solving to figure out which villain is trying to hack their friend.

programme.title: Fish Story!
programme.desc: Vic and Owen find themselves, along with Sinjin, in the middle of a massive dino-fight in the old Jurassic Park Visitor Center.

programme.title: Now or Never Witch
programme.desc: As the team battles this deadly foe, the Never Witch begins her ultimate spell, one that could unravel the very fabric of the dream world.

programme.title: Never Forever
programme.desc: With the dream world on the brink of collapse, the dream chasers launch a risky plan to defeat the Never Witch

programme.title: Sheep Freak
programme.desc: The dream chasers manage a challenging incursion by returning a doom sheep to the dream world, where they discover a dark force increasing in power.

programme.title: Holiday Gift Swap Disaster
programme.desc: While the rest of the group gets creative and makes new, personalized gifts from scratch. In the end, it's a reminder that it's not about the gifts—it's about the thought and effort you put into showing you care.

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers to go out and get more ice, they find it odd: when has Tony every volunteered to get anything? Suddenly, ULTRON appears on a screen: he's taken control of Iron Man! To make matters worse, Ultron takes over all the versions of Iron Man's armor and they fly off!The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the “Li

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro,

programme.title: The Monsters and the Mech!

programme.title: The Snowball Effect

programme.title: Ley-La, Rise of a Music Star
programme.desc: Olly is feeling the intense pressure of their newfound fame, and it's starting to take a toll on him. He's caught up in the glamour and the spotlight, but it's beginning to cloud his judgment and affect his relationships with his friends.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in th

programme.title: The Legends of CHIMA
programme.desc: Laval the Lion and Cragger the Crocodile are the best of friends. But when young Cragger becomes king of the Crocodiles, he tries to conquer all of the CHI. Former friends become worst enemies.

programme.title: Mission: Critical!
programme.desc: Owen and Claire must rescue a theme-park reviewer from a sabotaged aerialtram - and a salivating T-Rex.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Ninja follow a clue to Arin's location but find a new threat, while Nya, Kai and Wyldfyre spark old grudges in their search for Jay.

programme.title: The Ultimate Object of Admiration
programme.desc: Arin nurses Ras back to health as they continue his training, meanwhile their trail leads the Ninja into more danger.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The residents of Elverton-Cum-Latterly battle in the Dominoes Competition that dates back decades, but when the event occurs the same night as a drag queen fundraiser for a terminally ill teenager, it results in a deadly clash of cultures.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy landowner Gregory Lancaster's body goes missing on the night of his death, a sinister web of secrets and lies is exposed in the village of Little Malton as Barnaby, Nelson and Kam Karimore are drawn into a world of body-snatching.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Mysterious lights are seen in the sky over famous UFO hot-spot Cooper Hill. When a local forest ranger suffers a strange death, the visiting UFO spotters are convinced aliens are responsible. DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson unearth suspicions, betrayals and long-buried secrets in their search for the truth.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The peace of idyllic Badger's Drift is shattered by an inexplicable murder. It falls to DCI Barnaby and Sergeant Troy to hunt down the killer. Their investigation uncovers a web of sinister events, some long buried in the past.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show in Midsomer Oaks, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions. Is famous magician Gideon Latimer to blame or is he the target?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Breaking the Chain An international cycling competition comes to the Midsomer village of Burwood Mantle. When the race leader is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson find themselves drawn into a ruthlessly competitive world of blackmail, bribery and bloodshed where winning comes at any cost.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A Dying Art Art comes to the picturesque Midsomer village of Angel's Rise with the opening of a new sculpture park. When its launch is marred by murder, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson have to get creative if they are to crack a case where art imitates death, and everything has a deeper meaning.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Saints and Sinners The discovery of a Saint's bones at an archaeological dig causes a stir in the village of Midsomer Cicely. But when the leader of the dig is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson soon realise that it is not only skeletons that have been long buried in the hallowed ground.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harvest of Souls The annual harvest fair and the daredevil riders of the Wall of Death arrive in Whitcombe Mallet the owner of an equestrian centre is trampled by his horse.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: With the help of Acting DC Ben Jones, Barnaby investigates the garrotting of a husband and wife outside a deserted cottage near Midsomer Newton. Despite a reputation for being haunted, Winyard is a magnet for villagers, developers and conservationists. Barnaby and Jones must separate truth from rumour in order the reveal the cottage's secrets - and catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Midsomer Barton is celebrating Oak Apple Week when a mother is found drowned. It looks like suicide, and that she was driven to it by grief over her dead daughter. Barnaby investigates and is shaken by two villagers who look like murder victims from his past. Then another body is discovered and it appears that the festivities have stirred up a cocktail of adultery, contempt, unrequited love and revenge in the village.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The death of wealthy aristocrat Sir Freddy Butler brings Barnaby and Jones to the privileged surroundings of Haddington Hall. It looks like Freddy suffered a heart attack, but when his will disappears and his lawyer is killed in an arson attack, the detectives close in on Freddy's family. What are they hiding, and where are the mysterious Haddington diamonds?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When council clerk Martin Barrett is shot dead, Barnaby and Jones discover that he was an expert blackmailer. They investigate which of his victims hated him enough to kill him, and the trail leads to Fennacombe Bay. Why are Richard and Maggie Florian spending so much time at sea, and could police committee chairman Sir John Waverley have a scandalous past? With the help of Barnaby, they intend to find out.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A battle of the sexes which has raged in Broughton since the First World War comes to a head when ageing feminist Mildred Danvers is found dead after returning to her childhood home. As Barnaby investigates, the misogynist vicar Rev Gantis is shot through the head during a humiliating donkey race at the village fair. Is the killer on the side of the men or women - or do tragedies in Broughton's past hold the answer?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Noo-Noo tidies up Home hill before the Teletubbies slide up the slide to watch Natalie tell us about her brother's christening.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies leave their favourite things to watch some boys spinning some spinning tops to celebrate the Hanukah festival. Tinky Winky wears the skirt on his head to do a very special round and round dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Cleveland Browns v Minnesota Vikings (Kick-off 2.30pm). Coverage of the week five match from Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London, as the first of three games in the UK takes place. Minnesota came out on top in that meeting as they thrashed Cleveland 33-16.

programme.desc: Buffalo Bills v New England Patriots (Kick-off 1.20am). Coverage of the week five match from Highmark Stadium.
