programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officer's unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: The Bikeriders

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girl's middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher, life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth, and has a loving daughter. However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kat's own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his family's ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.desc: Just before the First World War, a safe-cracking thief is baffling the Paris police.

programme.desc: Classic crime drama. During a charity match between Arsenal and the Trojans, the Trojans' striker mysteriously collapses in full view of the capacity crowd. When it is discovered that he has been poisoned, Scotland Yard is called in to investigate.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: A young woman unwittingly becomes a witness to a murder.

programme.desc: When six-year-old Robbie runs away he stumbles upon a man, Chris, with a dead body. Scared that Robbie will report him, he takes him. They become close as they spend time together and when Robbie becomes ill, Chris has to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Double Exposure
programme.desc: Pete Fleming is a private detective called into service by an advertising executive

programme.title: Cage of Gold

Alan proposes to Judith, begging her not to become entangled with Bill, but she rejects his proposal. She is swept into a whirlwind romance with Bill and marries him

programme.title: Twenty-One Days
programme.desc: Laurence Olivier and Vivien Leigh star in a tale of murder and unforeseen consequences.

programme.title: Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: On trial for the murder of his wife Belle, Dr. Crippen recalls their life in north London: her affairs with other men, the way she treated him little better than a servant, their reconciliations, her insistent and abhorrent sexual claims on him.

programme.title: To The Public Danger
programme.desc: Cole and Reggie meet up with Fred and Nan at a pub. Cole has designs on Nan, and to show off, he drives them all to a pub. While driving over the limit he hits a cyclist. As they reach another pub, Fred calls the police. Where will their journey end?

programme.title: Intruder
programme.desc: Wolf Merton, a London stockbroker with a fine war record as Colonel of a Tank Regiment, has since lost touch with all the men who served under his wartime command. One evening he returns to his Belgravia home and finds that there is an 'intruder' in the house.

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack Denton's grandfather Harry comes out of prison. He is soon up to his old tricks: embarrassment and chaos follow.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A plot to flood Britain with counterfeit notes is discovered by the CIA in Paris. A suspect who resembles the gang leader, Chancellor, is arrested and is persuaded to take on his identity in order to infiltrate the gang and foil their plan.

programme.title: Find the Lady
programme.desc: When a pretty model spends New Year's Eve investigating the disappearance of her grandmother she is drawn into a sinister web of theft, kidnapping and, finally, murder.

programme.title: Circus of Fear
programme.desc: Following an audacious theft of banknotes, Inspector Elliott of Scotland Yard poses as a photographer to visit the circus from which some of the banknotes have come into circulation.

programme.title: Beast Must Die
programme.desc: Millionaire big game hunter Tom Newcliffe assembles an odd assortment of guests at his hunting lodge with the purpose of tracking down the biggest game of all - a werewolf.

programme.title: Penny and the Pownall Case
programme.desc: An artist's model, with aspirations to be an amateur detective, helps a Scotland Yard detective break a gang helping Nazi war criminals escape from Europe.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Sybil's growing interest in politics lands her in trouble when Bates lets slip to Robert that she attended a rally with Branson. The saga of the wine thief is brought to a head after Bates makes a shocking revelation and hands in his notice. Edith seems to have found an unexpected admirer when Sir Anthony Strallan calls, and Carson receives a letter informing him of the rumours harming Mary.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora discovers she is pregnant, which leaves Mary wondering how to answer Matthew's proposal, since his situation would change completely if the baby turns out to be a boy. Elsewhere, Mary accuses Edith of spreading the story that threatens to ruin her. Meanwhile, O'Brien is angry when she suspects that Cora is going to replace her, so plans an accident for her mistress.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It is now 1916 and the family and servants are preparing the house for a benefits concert in aid of the local hospital. New housemaid Ethel has replaced Gwen but she soon has everyone's backs up - and O'Brien plays a cruel trick on her. Robert is now Lord Lieutenant of the County but is disappointed by not being at the front.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It is April 1917 and, with most of the men away at the front, Carson is finding it tough maintaining standards in the house. Robert's new valet Henry Lang has just returned from the war, but O'Brien is the only one to notice that he is not well. The suicide of a young officer prompts Isobel to suggest that they convert Downton into a convalescent hospital. Also, Mary hears that Matthew is returning.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It is 1917 and Downton has been turned into a convalescent home for wounded officers. There is a lot to do, and the arrival of the first patients turns the house upside down. Matthew brings General Sir Herbert Strutt to inspect the home, unaware that Branson is planning to make the visit a memorable one. Meanwhile, Violet hopes to find skeletons in Lavinia's closet.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the village of Angel's Rise hosts the Psychic Fayre. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the festival, Barnaby must step into the spiritual world to find the killer.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The news of Martin's Imperial College job offer flies through the village, but the Ellinghams are yet to make a decision. Meanwhile, Caitlin blames Bert for the pub flood.

programme.title: Coldwater

Breakfast sees things take a downward turn as the self-service buffet is met with some tough criticism. At feedback Rob and Michelle are angered by the comments and are left wanting answers.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Crown at Whitchurch in Herefordshire, where ex-army man Tom Jones runs the pub B&B with his step-daughter Samara Cohen. Initial impressions are good as Martin and Hannah struggle to find fault and Clare and Fran feel like queens. But, still smarting following their feedback, Rob and Michelle have a fair few gripes. During an afternoon racing an army-style assault course the competitiveness within the group is clear.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

At dinner, there are tensions as the group discuss who would take which role if they were to run a B&B together. Breakfast is cooked by Clare, but peppery eggs and missing mushrooms cause concern.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis tries to get a birthday present by saying thank you to his relatives. However, because of Dennis' naughty personality, they take his attempts in a negative way. Followed by 'Dennis Hiccups'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After a wrestling accident, Gnasher swallows a canister of laughing gas at the vet's. Dennis, along with Gnasher hide in the conference centre, where dad gives a speech. However, the canister leaks, causing Gnasher to fart laughing gas and having everyone laughing. Followed by 'Attack of the Walterbot'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and Co. have to control Pie Face's obsession with pies during the Pie Festival. Otherwise, they will be grounded. Followed by 'Great Outdoors'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: On a school trip, Dennis finds out that he is descentant to a warrior tribe. He also discovers that Montanna Smith (a famous Indiana Jones-esque explorer and one of Walter's personal heroes) is actually a thief who's trying to steal the treasure of Dennis' ancestor. Will he be stopped before he gets his hands on the treasure? Followed by Dog Tired.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The Way of Den-Do After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Aliens Among Us After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Great Outdoors Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Game On To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Attack of the Walterbot For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis V.I.P With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All Hallowseve: While out on a mischief-making mission to destroy the Smurfs' Happy Halloween party, Gargamel and Hogatha catch Lazy who has been accidentally turned red by Mother Nature. Papa and the Smurfs help Lazy escape while Mother Nature has Father Time help turn Lazy's red into blue just in time for the Halloween party.

programme.title: It Came From Outer Smurf
programme.desc: Dreamy wants to encounter beings from outer space so much that no one believes him when he talks of having met one. Yet the arrival of this extraterrestrial is going to wreak havoc in the Smurf Village...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: Handy's Window-Vision
programme.desc: Miner Smurf leaves no stone unturned and this is how he discovers a crystal that transmits images. Thus Handy is able to invent window-vision and, every morning from then on, the Smurfs are able to watch Hefty's workouts, Farmer Smurf's crop reports or even the Brainy Smurf Hour. But would you believe it? The evil wizard Gargamel takes advantage of this image-watching to catch Smurfs!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Poet And Painter: Because they feel unappreciated, Poet and Painter leave Smurf Village and head for Storm Island, totally unaware that Gargamel is planning to trap them. Papa Smurf and his faithful volunteers rescue their friends.

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: Educating Bigmouth
programme.desc: The Smurfs try to teach Bigmouth about romance, manners, and getting a job after Bignose kicks him out. He returns to her refined, but Bigteeth is courting Bignose. Bignose realizes what she was missing and takes Bigmouth back to live happily ever after.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Patchwork Bear: There isn't a River Smurf anymore: someone has frozen it near its source. The Smurfs go to the Emerald Empress' country to see what the trouble is, and they meet the Patchwork Bear as well as the Iron Pyrites...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette's Tooth: Oh dear! Sassette has lost a tooth. Papa Smurf explains that if she puts her tooth under her pillow, the Mouse Fairy will bring her a present in the morning. But the next morning there is no present under the pillow. The Mouse Fairy has not been. She has been captured in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. And now the evil wizard is concocting a dreadful plan.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - It's A Puppy's Life: The evil wizard Gargamel has got hold of magical ectoplasmic crystal eggs that will enable him to change bodies with Papa Smurf. What better plan could there be? Disguised as Papa Smurf, he's going to lead all the Smurfs to his cauldron! But as fate would have it, Gargamel is changed into Puppy, the Smurf doggie...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Worrywarts: Papa Smurf's worries make him break into a rash of worrywarts. The only way to relieve him of his bout of indecision-inducing disease is to have him rub the horn of a Wartmonger, a sloppy, slimy, stupid and brutal enemy of the Pussywillow Pixies...

programme.title: Smurfs On Wheels
programme.desc: Every year, all the Smurfs make the long hike to Dreamy Steamy Springs. But this year, only Grandpa Smurf, Papa Smurf and Nat are going to walk there. All the other Smurfs are too busy – and too lazy – to walk. But then Handy comes up with what he calls his Customised Smurfwagon. No need to walk, you just let yourself roll along... Of course, things won't be as simple as all that.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Magic Stick
programme.desc: With a borrowed recipe from Homnibus, Papa Smurf creates a magic stick that Clumsy takes and loses in the woods. Soon after, Bigmouth comes for a visit and before he eats all the smurfberries, Papa Smurf finds the magic stick and whisks the giant away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hefty's Heart: Gargamel infects Hefty's heart with hate and then uses the little Smurf as a decoy for the others. Fortunately, Hefty's love overcomes his hate and he helps his little friends escape from Gargamel's clutches.

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfily Ever After: The boy from the wood and Laconia, the deaf-mute elf, ask Papa Smurf to celebrate their wedding. The Smurfs are getting the party ready, following the advice of the Smurfette, when Gargamel comes to put a spoke in their wheel.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf A Mile In My Shoes: The Smurfs band together to retrieve a sea-shell they need to release a hermit imp from the Sea Witch, as she cursed him with ugliness and a language very few understand. The Smurfs return with the sea-shell in time to break the curse and return the hermit to the handsome imp he once was.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Squeaky: This is the dramatic, moving story of the friendship between Smurfette and her pet mouse. A sad event reduces Smurfette to tears... Can the Smurfs comfort the despairing Smurfette?

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Golden Tresses: Hogatha, the repulsive witch, captures the Smurfette. She wants to steal from the little blue beauty her golden hair. Can the Smurfs save their little female companion before it is too late? Can Hogatha grow hair like Smurfette's?

programme.title: Can't Smurf The Music
programme.desc: There is nothing the sorceress Chlorhydris hates so much as love in the world. She would like to see all love banished from the face of the Earth, and she's going to start with music. She puts a spell on a magic horn so that it will suck the music out of every song... especially the Smurfs' songs. Helped by their friend Laconia, the Smurfs may be able to resist Chlorhydris' evil plan...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Adventures Of Robin Smurf: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really good actor...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: Things That Go Smurf In The Night
programme.desc: When Snappy loses his Huggy teddy bear, he can't get to sleep despite Papa's efforts to convince him that teddy bears are magical and can take care of themselves. Gargamel stumbles into the Smurfs' village and Huggy returns as a giant bear to scare him away and save Snappy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Shadow: Accidents do happen. This time it is Jokey Smurf's mistake that ends up with his shadow coming to independent life! And the shadow loves to play practical jokes on the whole population of the Village of the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Gallant Smurf
programme.desc: Queen Felicity will not let her son, Prince Godfrey, marry his sweetheart Pricilla. What she wants as a daughter-in-law is a girl who shows her something she's never seen before. When Hogatha learns of this, and also discovers the existence of Grandpa Smurf, she feels confident that she can surprise the Queen with her capture. Of course, Hogatha must first capture Grandpa Smurf...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tattle-Tail Smurfs: Brainy Smurf's had enough. The Smurflings and Sassette keep on telling tales about him with unpleasant results. He therefore concocts a magic formula, taken from Papa Smurf's books of spells, which makes the little Smurfs' tails grow longer and longer every time they tell tales. What he hasn't counted on is that Gargamel now has a way of catching the Smurflings.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Blue Plague: Brainy Smurf has decided to dedicate himself to the wellbeing of his fellow Smurfs. He is going to cure them of all ills… With a little help from the evil Gargamel!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Horn Of Plenty
programme.desc: Mother Nature always does her best, but this time she's gone wrong. Her wand gets the wrong results and she accidentally damages the Autumn harvest. Now the Smurfs and all the forest animals face a lean and hungry winter. The only place where the Smurfs could get food would be the Land of Plenty. But Gargamel steals the famed Horn of Plenty to lure the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel The Generous: In an effort to find out where the Smurfs' secret diamond stash is hidden, Gargamel pretends to be their friend. When he shows his true, wicked self, Papa Smurf works a magic spell to save his little Smurfs from the vicious clutches of the evil wizard.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Unsound Smurf: In an effort to give Papa some quiet time, Brainy uses one of Papa's spells to create a magical sound barrier around the village. Papa cannot reverse the spell and sends the Smurflings, who are trapped outside the Village, to a noisemaker. Baby takes a bottle of sound from the noisemaker, which breaks the barrier.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: Tailor's Magic Needle
programme.desc: Tailor Smurf has to make an outfit for every Smurf before the Fall fashion show. Brainy Smurf wants to help him and, using Papa Smurf's book of Magic, he conjures up a magic needle that sews ten times faster than tailor... But is it really any good?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lazy's Slumber Party: Poor Lazy! All he wants is a good night's rest. But no, all the Smurfs throw a party for him and, what's more, he gets dragged into a silly argument about painting giant Bigmouth's toes a bright tangerine red... It's a long, sleepless night for poor Lazy Smurf!

programme.title: Have You Smurfed Your Pet Today?
programme.desc: The Smurfs get so involved with Handy's new toy that they forget to feed Puppy. Gargamel lures Puppy into a cage with food and holds him for ransom – the Smurfs' magic secrets. The Smurflings distract Gargamel with the toy long enough to rescue Puppy and they vow to never neglect him again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Born Rotten: As the Smurfs prepare for the Festival of the Stars, Gargamel plants a creature in their midst that smells so rotten that he can easily be traced to the Smurf village. Papa Smurf realizes that Born Rotten is from another planet, and he instructs Feathers to return him to his home before Gargamel finds them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Blue Plague: Brainy Smurf has decided to dedicate himself to the wellbeing of his fellow Smurfs. He is going to cure them of all ills… With a little help from the evil Gargamel!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Unsmurfy Games: To prove the worth of his Big Book of Wilderness Survival, Brainy takes the Smurflings to the swamp. Where, thanks to his expert advice, the tiny group gets totally lost, is then caught in quicklime and trapped by King Bullrush of the Wartmongers. Fortunately, Bullrush is in a playful mood and devises a Smurf hunt. Unfortunately, Brainy believes he is a born leader...

programme.title: Wedding Bells For Gargamel
programme.desc: The Smurfs befriend a maiden in distress who is betrothed to Gargamel by convincing her father that the foolish wizard is insane.

programme.title: Smurf On The Run
programme.desc: Little things can sometimes bring about big effects. In trying to catch Sassette, Gargamel upsets the Balance of Truth, and from then on everybody in the world tells lies. Even Papa Smurf is changed into a pathological liar. What is more, the Spirit of the Scales chain Gargamel and Sassette to each other, and together they have to replace the Topaz of Truth....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magic Rattle: The Smurfs help a fairy queen outwit the evil fairy Fallon who tries to take away her son's magic rattle.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett brings a kite to a boy named Akas in the Himalayas, who wants to fly it in a kite festival.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Mei from Beijing, China requests a shadow puppet to use in a shadow play. Her father is so busy at his dumpling restaurant that he might not make it to her performance!

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett goes to Venice, Italy with a mask for Luca to wear at his masquerade party.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett travels to Hawaii to bring Keilani a hula skirt that lights up. On the way to the "Best Hula Dancer" contest, it looks like an overflowing volcano will block the road!

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Princess Maribelle from England asks for sparkly collars for her puppies to wear at her royal tea party.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett delivers a sled to Ali in the Sahara, but the only place to ride it is on the sand dunes. The Super Wings bring real snow sledding to the desert when Donnie and Dizzy show up...

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Riley from Hollywood is directing his first action film. Jett brings an alien mask and ends up acting as the monster. Riley's demands get out of hand...

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Callum from Scotland wants bagpipes that blow bubbles so he can play them for Nessie, the Loch Ness Monster.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Jett takes a pair of running shoes that light up to Lorna in Kenya. She's going to run in a big race. While training, she crosses paths with a lost baby wildebeest.

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha or Dasha?

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Don't
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, he's killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonald's two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: The Shakiest Gun in the West
programme.desc: A pardoned stagecoach robber, becomes government agent and marries a naive unsuspecting east-coast dentist in order to join a wagon train.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: In the 19th century, Maggie Sergent and her family move to Wyoming seeking a new start. But when her husband is murdered, Maggie faces a harsh choice: build a life in the unforgiving West or return to the familiar safety of the East. Tragedy, resilience, and survival collide on the frontier.

programme.title: Two Brothers in Trinity
programme.desc: After inheriting a land plot in a dusty place called Trinity, the antagonistic half-brothers, Lester and Jesse, reunite to pursue different aspirations, only to find themselves neck-deep in trouble. Will they ever fulfil their dreams?

programme.title: Boot Hill Bandits
programme.desc: Shady town businessman Bolton seems to be the leader of the gang but even he takes his order from a higher authority who may have tried to take Marshal Corrigan's life.

programme.title: $100,000 for Ringo
programme.desc: Stranger Lee Barton rides into Rainbow Valley, mistaken for a man thought dead. As tensions rise with ruthless town boss Tom Cherry—who's after hidden gold and the affections of a local woman—Barton is drawn into violence and revenge. With a sheriff's help, he seeks justice and a new start with a boy who believes he's his father.

programme.title: The Red Pony
programme.desc: A ranch boy is gifted with a colt, grows to love him but the colt escapes, with tragic results.

programme.title: Captain Apache
programme.desc: A Native American born US Army officer, Captain Apache, investigating a murder, uncovers a presidential assassination plot.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: Mackenzie's Raiders EP25-28
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Ride Out for Revenge
programme.desc: When an Indian chief is murdered in a hateful town, a sympathizing ex marshal tries to stop the Indians from attacking for revenge.

programme.title: The Grand Duel
programme.desc: A grizzled ex-sheriff helps a man framed for murder to confront the powerful trio of brothers who want him dead.

programme.title: Red Coat
programme.desc: Cormack, the lawman most feared by the rugged pioneers at the turn of the century, has a mysterious bond with "Caribou," an outlaw whom he has jailed. When Caribou escapes from prison, he returns to seek revenge.

programme.title: Der Scharfschütze
programme.desc: Ein pensionierter Revolverheld, bei dem Krebs diagnostiziert wurde, reist in eine Stadt in Nevada, um vor seinem Tod einen Freund zu treffen. Doch er kann seinem Ruf nicht entkommen, und die Stadt beginnt sich mit schießwütigen Männern zu füllen, die den Ruhm erlangen wollen, ihn zu töten.

programme.title: Lüge und Wahrheit
programme.desc: Als der berühmte Journalist Stephen Glass plötzlich von einem Forbes-Reporter unter die Lupe genommen wird, kommt heraus, dass Glass viele seiner sensationellen Geschichten nur erfunden hat. Ein fesselndes, faktenbasiertes Drama über einen tiefen Absturz.

programme.title: Pumping Iron
programme.desc: Drehbuch-Dokumentation mit Arnold Schwarzenegger und weiteren Teilnehmern, die hoffen, den begehrten Bodybuilding-Titel "Mr. Olympia" zu gewinnen, während sie die Reise vom Strand von Venedig zum Wettkampfgelände in Pretoria, Südafrika, antreten.

programme.title: Conan der Barbar
programme.desc: Der legendäre cimmerische Krieger Conan kämpft einen epischen Kampf gegen Gegner, Monster und Hindernisse, als er erkennt, dass er der Einzige ist, der die großen Nationen von Hyboria retten kann.

programme.title: Herkules in New York
programme.desc: Hercules langweilt sich und bittet seinen Vater Zeus um Urlaub auf der Erde. Seine Bitte wird abgeschmettert, aber durch einen Unfall mit einem von Zeus' Blitzen wird Hercules in die Stadt New York geschleudert. Seine mangelnde Erfahrung mit Menschen und seine Arroganz führen zwangsläufig zu Problemen, bis die Tochter eines Collegeprofessors sich seiner annimmt und ihm dabei hilft, sich anzupassen. Er beginnt, Freude am Leben auf der Erde zu empfinden und möchte länger bleiben, selbst als sein Vater Zeus Nemesis schickt, um ihn zu bestrafen.

programme.title: Conan der Barbar
